item.title: My Experience with Boomintro.com
item.author: David Wicks
item.description:
My Experience with Boomintro.com

Many months ago, I was having a long conversation on WhatsApp with a long-time friend. He was telling me about his latest business ventures and how he was using AI to help him create some really interesting business opportunities. item.title: The Real Cost of Hockey (And Why it is Worth Every Penny)
item.author: David Wicks
item.description:
I’m currently a parent of three boys in hockey, and I’ll be honestâ€”there are times when it feels overwhelming.

The driving. The equipment costs. Gas prices. Meals on the road. Tournament weekends. When I look at it purely from that perspective, I sometimes wonder: What are we doing? Why are we spending all this money as a family?

The Moment That Changes Everything

But then I have those moments. I had one just a few nights ago, driving home from a game about an hour away.
